subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text: Ages in {{lang|zh|歲}} are traditionally reckoned using the Chinese lunar calendar, considered as 1 year old at the moment of birth and increasing not during birthdays, but at the [[Chinese New Year]].

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character lacks JIS support and is not used in Japan. The character [[歳]] (U+6B73) is used instead.
